alert.note: Alert for Western Crook; Wyoming Black Hills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 9:19PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Crook County through 945 PM MDT... At 919 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles east of Pine Haven, or 17 miles west of Sundance, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Devils Tower Junction around 930 PM MDT. Warren Peak around 935 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 161 and 169, and between Mile Markers 172 and 173. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
